name: Drakokrystal
description:
Summary:

This is a Turn-Based Strategy game in a setting that includes typical fantasy elements mixed with military equipment from WWII to the late 1970's

Current Version: Alpha 1 Story/Setting:

In 1970, a mysterious portal appeared orbiting Earth approximately half the distance between the planet and it's Moon.  It was discovered that an Earth-like planet was on the other side.  A manned expedition discovered crystals with strange and powerful properties.  These were the Drakokrystals.  The Cold War was still in full swing and soon it became a new facet of the times to create colonies upon the new planet which was now being called Leyterra.  After several decades, the portal would close as suddenly as it appeared, trapping many humans on Leyterra.  

This game takes place several hundred years after the portal closed.  Nations have risen and fallen, knowledge lost and recovered, and humans have spread out across the globe.  They are not the only ones to call the planet home and there is plenty of conflict in this world.  The God of Strife, Kemarel, sends his cultists and monsters to disrupt what peace can be found as often as they can.  Kemarel's followers have been causing more trouble then they used to recently.  A good mercenary company could stand to make a tidy profit and just maybe they can uncover a secret that will make the world a better place... 

Current Features:
  • Three pre-made skirmish scenarios
  • Custom scenario creation, with randomly generated maps
  • Four Playable Factions
  • Hero characters with special abilities that include spellcasting
  • Tanks
  • A dynamic battlefield where buildings can be destroyed and fires will spread, changing the cover values and line of sight blocking properties of the tiles effected
Roadmap:
  • A Fog of War system that will change what both you and the enemy can see
  • The ability to call in off-map support like artillery barrages and air strikes
  • Unarmored vehicles, including transport vehicles
  • Additional Factions, Units and map size options
  • Low altitude flying Units like Helicopters and Dragons
  • A Narrative Campaign mode with base and resource management. Run your mercenary company your way and choose which Factions to aid.  Get access to rewards based on Faction Reputation.
